mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(price), 0), '999,999,999') total_sales FROM usageRecord u JOIN return r ON u.recordNum = r.recordNum WHERE TO_CHAR(return_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT COUNT(*) newCustomerCount FROM customer WHERE TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT COUNT(*) repairCount FROM repair WHERE state = '수리대기' OR state = '입고'
SELECT COUNT(*) rentalCount FROM usageRecord u JOIN return r ON u.recordNum = r.recordNum WHERE TO_CHAR(return_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT COUNT(*) damageCount FROM damage WHERE TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT RANK() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC) AS usageRank, COUNT(*) usageCount, name FROM usageRecord u JOIN return r ON u.recordNum = r.recordNum JOIN station s ON r.stNum = s.stNum GROUP BY name

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(price) DESC) AS salesRank, SUM(price) price, zoonName FROM usageRecord u JOIN return r ON u.recordNum = r.recordNum JOIN station s ON r.stNum = s.stNum GROUP BY zoonName ) WHERE salesRank <= 5

SELECT COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 1, 1, 2, 1, 3, 1)) t0, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 4, 1, 5, 1, 6, 1)) t3, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 7, 1, 8, 1, 9, 1)) t6, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 10, 1, 11, 1, 12, 1)) t9, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 13, 1, 14, 1, 15, 1)) t12, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 16, 1, 17, 1, 18, 1)) t15, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 19, 1, 20, 1, 21, 1)) t18, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 22, 1, 23, 1, 24, 1)) t21 FROM usageRecord u JOIN rental ren ON u.recordNum = ren.recordNum WHERE TO_CHAR(rental_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{year}, 'YYYY'), 'YYYY')-4 useDate, NVL(SUM(price), 0) totalMoney FROM usageRecord u JOIN return r ON u.recordNum = r.recordNum WHERE TO_CHAR(return_date, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{year}, 'YYYY'), 'YYYY')-4 UNION ALL
SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{year}, 'YYYY'), 'YYYY')-3 useDate, NVL(SUM(price), 0) totalMoney FROM usageRecord u JOIN return r ON u.recordNum = r.recordNum WHERE TO_CHAR(return_date, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{year}, 'YYYY'), 'YYYY')-3 UNION ALL
SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{year}, 'YYYY'), 'YYYY')-2 useDate, NVL(SUM(price), 0) totalMoney FROM usageRecord u JOIN return r ON u.recordNum = r.recordNum WHERE TO_CHAR(return_date, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{year}, 'YYYY'), 'YYYY')-2 UNION ALL
SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{year}, 'YYYY'), 'YYYY')-1 useDate, NVL(SUM(price), 0) totalMoney FROM usageRecord u JOIN return r ON u.recordNum = r.recordNum WHERE TO_CHAR(return_date, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{year}, 'YYYY'), 'YYYY')-1 UNION ALL
SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{year}, 'YYYY'), 'YYYY')-0 useDate, NVL(SUM(price), 0) totalMoney FROM usageRecord u JOIN return r ON u.recordNum = r.recordNum WHERE TO_CHAR(return_date, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{year}, 'YYYY'), 'YYYY')

SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{month}, 'YYYYMM'), -11), 'YYYYMM') useDate, NVL(SUM(price), 0) totalMoney FROM usageRecord u JOIN return r ON u.recordNum = r.recordNum WHERE TO_CHAR(return_date, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{month}, 'YYYYMM'), -11), 'YYYYMM') UNION ALL
SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{month}, 'YYYYMM'), -10), 'YYYYMM') useDate, NVL(SUM(price), 0) totalMoney FROM usageRecord u JOIN return r ON u.recordNum = r.recordNum WHERE TO_CHAR(return_date, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{month}, 'YYYYMM'), -10), 'YYYYMM') UNION ALL
SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{month}, 'YYYYMM'), -9), 'YYYYMM') useDate, NVL(SUM(price), 0) totalMoney FROM usageRecord u JOIN return r ON u.recordNum = r.recordNum WHERE TO_CHAR(return_date, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{month}, 'YYYYMM'), -9), 'YYYYMM') UNION ALL
SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{month}, 'YYYYMM'), -8), 'YYYYMM') useDate, NVL(SUM(price), 0) totalMoney FROM usageRecord u JOIN return r ON u.recordNum = r.recordNum WHERE TO_CHAR(return_date, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{month}, 'YYYYMM'), -8), 'YYYYMM') UNION ALL
SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{month}, 'YYYYMM'), -7), 'YYYYMM') useDate, NVL(SUM(price), 0) totalMoney FROM usageRecord u JOIN return r ON u.recordNum = r.recordNum WHERE TO_CHAR(return_date, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{month}, 'YYYYMM'), -7), 'YYYYMM') UNION ALL
SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{month}, 'YYYYMM'), -6), 'YYYYMM') useDate, NVL(SUM(price), 0) totalMoney FROM usageRecord u JOIN return r ON u.recordNum = r.recordNum WHERE TO_CHAR(return_date, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{month}, 'YYYYMM'), -6), 'YYYYMM') UNION ALL
SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{month}, 'YYYYMM'), -5), 'YYYYMM') useDate, NVL(SUM(price), 0) totalMoney FROM usageRecord u JOIN return r ON u.recordNum = r.recordNum WHERE TO_CHAR(return_date, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{month}, 'YYYYMM'), -5), 'YYYYMM') UNION ALL
SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{month}, 'YYYYMM'), -4), 'YYYYMM') useDate, NVL(SUM(price), 0) totalMoney FROM usageRecord u JOIN return r ON u.recordNum = r.recordNum WHERE TO_CHAR(return_date, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{month}, 'YYYYMM'), -4), 'YYYYMM') UNION ALL
SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{month}, 'YYYYMM'), -3), 'YYYYMM') useDate, NVL(SUM(price), 0) totalMoney FROM usageRecord u JOIN return r ON u.recordNum = r.recordNum WHERE TO_CHAR(return_date, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{month}, 'YYYYMM'), -3), 'YYYYMM') UNION ALL
SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{month}, 'YYYYMM'), -2), 'YYYYMM') useDate, NVL(SUM(price), 0) totalMoney FROM usageRecord u JOIN return r ON u.recordNum = r.recordNum WHERE TO_CHAR(return_date, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{month}, 'YYYYMM'), -2), 'YYYYMM') UNION ALL
SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{month}, 'YYYYMM'), -1), 'YYYYMM') useDate, NVL(SUM(price), 0) totalMoney FROM usageRecord u JOIN return r ON u.recordNum = r.recordNum WHERE TO_CHAR(return_date, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{month}, 'YYYYMM'), -1), 'YYYYMM') UNION ALL
SELECT #{month} useDate, NVL(SUM(price), 0) totalMoney FROM usageRecord u JOIN return r ON u.recordNum = r.recordNum WHERE TO_CHAR(return_date, 'YYYYMM') = #{month}

SELECT TO_CHAR(return_date, 'YYYYMMDD') useDate, NVL(SUM(price), 0) totalMoney FROM usageRecord u JOIN return r ON u.recordNum = r.recordNum WHERE TO_CHAR(return_date, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(return_date, 'YYYYMMDD') ORDER BY useDate
SELECT COUNT(age) value, age name FROM customer GROUP BY age ORDER BY age
SELECT COUNT(gender) value, gender name FROM customer GROUP BY gender ORDER BY gender

SELECT COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 1, 1)) t0, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 2, 1)) t1, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 3, 1)) t2, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 4, 1)) t3, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 5, 1)) t4, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 6, 1)) t5, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 7, 1)) t6, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 8, 1)) t7, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 9, 1)) t8, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 10, 1)) t9, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 11, 1)) t10, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 12, 1)) t11, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 13, 1)) t12, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 14, 1)) t13, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 15, 1)) t14, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 16, 1)) t15, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 17, 1)) t16, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 18, 1)) t17, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 19, 1)) t18, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 20, 1)) t19, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 21, 1)) t20, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 22, 1)) t21, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 23, 1)) t22, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(rental_date,'HH24'), 24, 1)) t23 FROM usageRecord u JOIN rental r ON u.recordNum = r.recordNum
SELECT name, COUNT(s.stNum) value FROM usageRecord u JOIN rental r ON u.recordNum = r.recordNum JOIN station s ON r.stNum = s.stNum GROUP BY name
